title: 關聖帝君一百籤第七十籤
subtitle: 王曾祈禱庚癸

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是… 雲雷雨風各有其神祇掌管，至誠的禱告能打動這些天機，將乾旱的季節轉化為甘霖。詩中指出，正是「隆中」的中伏時期，預示著雨將降臨。
analysis.en: 這首詩的主題是… The poem portrays that thunder, rain, wind, and cloud are each governed by their own divine forces, and sincere prayers can stir these powers, turning a dry season into sweet rain. It points to the hidden central period of the year (mid‑summer) where rain is promised to arrive.
analysis.jp: 這首詩の主題は… 雲・雷・雨・風はそれぞれに神の意志があり、誠実な祈りでそれらを動かし、干ばつの季節を甘露に変えることが示唆されています。詩は、隆中の中伏時期に雨が降ると告げています。
analysis.reference: 宋。王曾。字孝先。益都人。自少穎悟。善為文辭。咸平中三元及第。累官石僕。財乎章事。封沂國公。諡文正。居官之日。偶偵乾旱。輒竭誠禱。必沛自霖。乃止。其在明廷。正色危言。進退士人。莫有知者。嘗曰。夫執政者。恩欲歸己。怨欲歸誰。范仲淹深服其言。

rag_analysis: According to the poem, the core meaning is: • The natural elements—thunder, rain, wind, and cloud—each follow their own divine order. • Sincere prayer serves as the conduit that can influence these forces, turning a dry season into sweet rain. • The poem specifically mentions that during the hidden central (mid‑summer) period, a long‑awaited rain will finally arrive, offering relief from drought. • Symbolically, this reflects the interplay of genuine faith and timely action in bringing about favorable change.
